column5: hey guys planning on going muskie fishing tomorrow and dont know where to go. im stuck between 2 lakes, pigeon and scugog. which one do you think i should go to? has anyone been having any luck latly?  thanks
Not much in Scugog other than little dink muskies, so if your looking for anything decent hit Pigeon or Upper Buck.
Pigeon would be my choice.  If you strike out on the muskie the smallies should cooperate.
tons of 30 inch skis in the bog if you want size though pigeon is my choice, some fat girls hanging off red rock and grandfather shoal
Yep.. just dinks in the Bog...
It would have been funny if pigeontroller said the bog.  Honestly though, go put the bloody hours in and you tell us.  Lol.   Good luck wherever you go.  Cheers.
That was a fun day Wayne..... until we had to retrieve your boat from the crooked ramp
Must be the fish cause I'M never angry when I'm fish'n

I remember this post from Scugog it seemed like it was 4-5 yrs. ago. Think a few other musky were caught on this successful outing. Wow, time flies.  I would go to Pigeon though. The weeds at Scugog drive me nuts.
Yes Erik... I've just gotta say it one more time... FIVE for me.. one for Lew !
Pigeon in mho! Found that the north end of the lake is the way to go !
...somebody told him to pose with a 35 inch fish
Well, look who he's fishing with.....
Totally different lake. They both have good size muskie. This time I probably go the Bog. In Fall I will try Pigeon and Buckhorn.
